title: Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices and Sound Effects
description: Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices brings you 160+ fantasy game styled magic voices, spiritual vocal spells, & enchanting game sound effects.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demos


Create Compelling Cinematic Game Characters With Ease

Useful in MMO, RPG, animations, video games, mobile apps, motion graphics, film, and software development, Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices is a go-to collection of magical spell incantation voices and audio creativity. Inside youâ€™ll find over 160+ distinctive, immersive voice sound effects, vocalizations, special SFX & more. Creating compelling cinematic game characters and outstanding gameplay audio experiences has never been easier!


Explore thru 37 inspiring spell voice sound sets featuring mystical enchants, conjures, summons, ritual chants, imaginative supernatural beings that are perfect for any fantasy production! Each voice sound set will have multiple variations within the set like a whisper, reverse, deep/sub, group, chant, spoken word & more.


Highest Quality SFX To Help You Design Immersive Gameplay

Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices is designed specifically for magic & fantasy games. The audio texture of the entire sound library is ethereal, demonic, full of weight, power & emotion. This collection is perfect for designing in-game magic, sweetening pre-existing spell sounds & adding a unique collection of fantasy voice alerts & notifications to your soundbank.
technicalDetails:
Product Details:

  • 230 MB of fantasy spell game voice sound effects
  • 164 sound effect files
  • Dark magic voice & spell sound effects library
  • Game-ready & designed sound effects
  • Perfect for game developers & sound designers
  • All in 44.1k/16bit .wav audio file format
  • Includes Soundminer metadata
  • Over 21 minutes of audio
  • Features 37 magic voice spell sound sets
  • Group chants, ritualistic whispers
  • Professional gibberish, layered voice spells
  • Demonic conjures, summons
  • Magic spell casts, & sweeteners
  • Each voice spell sound set includes multiple file variations: whispers, group chants, reverse, echo, spoken word
  • All sound effects are Royalty-Free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)


Number of Audio Waves: 164

Number of Audio Cues: 164

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 21m 43s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes
